# OhdsiShinyModules

[![Build
Status](https://github.com/OHDSI/OhdsiShinyModules/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/OHDSI/OhdsiShinyModules/actions?query=workflow%3AR-CMD-check)
[![codecov.io](https://codecov.io/github/OHDSI/OhdsiShinyModules/coverage.svg?branch=main)](https://codecov.io/github/OHDSI/OhdsiShinyModules?branch=main)

OhdsiShinyModules is part of [HADES](https://ohdsi.github.io/Hades/).

OhdsiShinyModules is an R package containing shiny modules that can be
used within shiny result interfaces.

The OHDSI tools often provide shiny interfaces for viewing and exploring
results. Many of these shiny apps have overlapping features. To ensure
consistency we have created a repository containing useful shiny modules
that can be used in multiple result explorers.

# Current Modules

- about module: this contains information about the shiny viewer and the
  types of OHDSI analyses.
- cohort diagnostics module: a module for exploring CohortDiagnostics
  results.
- characterization module: a module for exploring Characterization and
  CohortIncidence results.
- estimation module: a module for exploring CohortMethod,
  SelfControlledCaseSeries and EvidenceSynthesis results.
- prediction module: a module for exploring patient-level prediction
  results that were developed usign the OHDSI PatientLevelPrediction
  package.
- report module: a module that uses ReportGenerator to create a report
  based on user specified inputs.

# Technology

OhdsiShinyModules is an R package that uses the R shiny library.

# System Requirements

Requires R (version 3.3.0 or higher).

# Installation

1.  See the instructions
    [here](https://ohdsi.github.io/Hades/rSetup.html) for configuring
    your R environment, including Java.

2.  To install the latest stable version:

&nbsp;

    install.packages('remotes')
    remotes::install_github('ohdsi/OhdsiShinyModules')

# User Documentation

Documentation can be found on the [package
website](https://ohdsi.github.io/OhdsiShinyModules/).

# Support

- Developer questions/comments/feedback: [OHDSI
  Forum](http://forums.ohdsi.org/c/developers)
- We use the [GitHub issue
  tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/OhdsiShinyModules/issues) for all
  bugs/issues/enhancements

# Contributing

- Read [here](https://ohdsi.github.io/Hades/contribute.html) how you can
  contribute to this package.
- This [website](https://mastering-shiny.org/scaling-modules.html) may
  be helpful if you want to see an introduction into how to write shiny
  modules

# License

OhdsiShinyModules is licensed under Apache License 2.0

# Development

OhdsiShinyModules is being developed in R Studio.

# Acknowledgements

- The package is maintained by and has been developed with major
  contributions from

# Package index

## OHDSI Shiny Modules

Modules for OHDSI shiny apps.

- [`OhdsiShinyModules-package`](OhdsiShinyModules.md)
  [`OhdsiShinyModules`](OhdsiShinyModules.md) : OhdsiShinyModules

## Prediction module

Modules for prediction results.

- [`patientLevelPredictionHeatmapServer()`](patientLevelPredictionHeatmapServer.md)
  : The module server for exploring prediction model discrimination
  results
- [`patientLevelPredictionHeatmapViewer()`](patientLevelPredictionHeatmapViewer.md)
  : The module viewer for exploring prediction model discrimination
  results
- [`patientLevelPredictionHelperFile()`](patientLevelPredictionHelperFile.md)
  : The location of the prediction module helper file
- [`patientLevelPredictionModelServer()`](patientLevelPredictionModelServer.md)
  : The module server for exploring prediction models
- [`patientLevelPredictionModelViewer()`](patientLevelPredictionModelViewer.md)
  : The module viewer for exploring prediction models
- [`patientLevelPredictionPlotServer()`](patientLevelPredictionPlotServer.md)
  : The module server for exploring prediction model discrimination
  results
- [`patientLevelPredictionPlotViewer()`](patientLevelPredictionPlotViewer.md)
  : The module viewer for exploring prediction model discrimination
  results
- [`patientLevelPredictionServer()`](patientLevelPredictionServer.md) :
  The module server for exploring PatientLevelPrediction
- [`patientLevelPredictionViewer()`](patientLevelPredictionViewer.md) :
  The module viewer for exploring PatientLevelPrediction

## Characterization module

Modules for the characterization analyses.

- [`characterizationHelperFile()`](characterizationHelperFile.md) : The
  location of the characterization module helper file
- [`characterizationIncidenceServer()`](characterizationIncidenceServer.md)
  : The module server for exploring incidence results
- [`characterizationIncidenceViewer()`](characterizationIncidenceViewer.md)
  : The module viewer for exploring incidence results
- [`characterizationServer()`](characterizationServer.md) : The module
  server for exploring characterization studies
- [`characterizationViewer()`](characterizationViewer.md) : The module
  viewer for exploring characterization studies

## About module

Modules for the information page.

- [`aboutHelperFile()`](aboutHelperFile.md) : The location of the about
  module helper file
- [`aboutServer()`](aboutServer.md) : The module server for the shiny
  app home
- [`aboutViewer()`](aboutViewer.md) : The module viewer for the shiny
  app home

## Cohort Generator module

Modules for the cohort generator package.

- [`cohortGeneratorHelperFile()`](cohortGeneratorHelperFile.md) : The
  location of the cohort-generator module helper file
- [`cohortGeneratorServer()`](cohortGeneratorServer.md) : The module
  server for the main cohort generator module
- [`cohortGeneratorViewer()`](cohortGeneratorViewer.md) : The viewer of
  the main cohort generator module

## Estimator module

Modules for the CohortMethod, SCCS and Evidence Synthesis packages.

- [`cohortMethodAttritionServer()`](cohortMethodAttritionServer.md) :
  The module server for rendering the PLE attrition results
- [`cohortMethodAttritionViewer()`](cohortMethodAttritionViewer.md) :
  The module viewer for rendering the PLE attrition results
- [`cohortMethodCovariateBalanceServer()`](cohortMethodCovariateBalanceServer.md)
  : The module server for rendering the covariate balance plot
- [`cohortMethodCovariateBalanceViewer()`](cohortMethodCovariateBalanceViewer.md)
  : The module viewer for rendering the PLE covariate balance analysis
- [`cohortMethodKaplanMeierServer()`](cohortMethodKaplanMeierServer.md)
  : The module server for rendering the Kaplan Meier curve
- [`cohortMethodKaplanMeierViewer()`](cohortMethodKaplanMeierViewer.md)
  : The module viewer for rendering the PLE Kaplan Meier curve
- [`cohortMethodPopulationCharacteristicsServer()`](cohortMethodPopulationCharacteristicsServer.md)
  : The module server for rendering the population characteristics
- [`cohortMethodPopulationCharacteristicsViewer()`](cohortMethodPopulationCharacteristicsViewer.md)
  : The module viewer for rendering the PLE population characteristics
- [`cohortMethodPowerServer()`](cohortMethodPowerServer.md) : The module
  server for rendering the PLE power analysis results
- [`cohortMethodPowerViewer()`](cohortMethodPowerViewer.md) : The module
  viewer for rendering the PLE power analysis
- [`cohortMethodPropensityModelServer()`](cohortMethodPropensityModelServer.md)
  : The module server for rendering the propensity score model
- [`cohortMethodPropensityModelViewer()`](cohortMethodPropensityModelViewer.md)
  : The module viewer for rendering the PLE propensity score model
  covariates/coefficients
- [`cohortMethodPropensityScoreDistServer()`](cohortMethodPropensityScoreDistServer.md)
  : The module server for rendering a PLE propensity score distribution
- [`cohortMethodPropensityScoreDistViewer()`](cohortMethodPropensityScoreDistViewer.md)
  : The module viewer for rendering the propensity score distribution
- [`cohortMethodSystematicErrorServer()`](cohortMethodSystematicErrorServer.md)
  : The module server for rendering the systematic error objects
- [`cohortMethodSystematicErrorViewer()`](cohortMethodSystematicErrorViewer.md)
  : The module viewer for rendering the PLE systematic error objects
- [`estimationHelperFile()`](estimationHelperFile.md) : The location of
  the estimation module helper file
- [`estimationServer()`](estimationServer.md) : The module server for
  exploring estimation studies
- [`estimationViewer()`](estimationViewer.md) : The module viewer for
  exploring characterization studies

## Data diagnostics module

Modules for the DataDiagnostics package.

- [`dataDiagnosticDrillServer()`](dataDiagnosticDrillServer.md) : The
  module server for exploring prediction summary results
- [`dataDiagnosticDrillViewer()`](dataDiagnosticDrillViewer.md) : The
  module viewer for exploring data-diagnostic results in more detail
- [`dataDiagnosticHelperFile()`](dataDiagnosticHelperFile.md) : The
  location of the data-diagnostic module helper file
- [`dataDiagnosticServer()`](dataDiagnosticServer.md) : The module
  server for exploring data-diagnostic
- [`dataDiagnosticSummaryServer()`](dataDiagnosticSummaryServer.md) :
  The module server for exploring prediction summary results
- [`dataDiagnosticSummaryViewer()`](dataDiagnosticSummaryViewer.md) :
  The module viewer for exploring data-diagnostic summary results
- [`dataDiagnosticViewer()`](dataDiagnosticViewer.md) : The module
  viewer for exploring data-diagnostic

## Cohort Diagnostic module

Modules for the CohortDiagnostics package.

- [`cohortCountsModule()`](cohortCountsModule.md) : Shiny module for
  cohort counts
- [`cohortCountsView()`](cohortCountsView.md) : Cohort Counts View
- [`cohortDefinitionsModule()`](cohortDefinitionsModule.md) : Cohort
  Definition module
- [`cohortDefinitionsView()`](cohortDefinitionsView.md) : Cohort
  Definitions View
- [`cohortDiagCharacterizationView()`](cohortDiagCharacterizationView.md)
  : characterization
- [`cohortDiagnosticsHelperFile()`](cohortDiagnosticsHelperFile.md) :
  The location of the description module helper file
- [`cohortDiagnosticsServer()`](cohortDiagnosticsServer.md) : Cohort
  Diagnostics Explorer main module
- [`cohortDiagnosticsView()`](cohortDiagnosticsView.md) : View for
  cohort diagnostics module
- [`cohortOverlapView()`](cohortOverlapView.md) : Cohort Overlap View
- [`compareCohortCharacterizationView()`](compareCohortCharacterizationView.md)
  : compare characterization view
- [`conceptsInDataSourceView()`](conceptsInDataSourceView.md) : concepts
  In DataSource View
- [`createCdDatabaseDataSource()`](createCdDatabaseDataSource.md) :
  Create a CD data source from a database
- [`databaseInformationView()`](databaseInformationView.md) : database
  Information View
- [`getCirceRenderedExpression()`](getCirceRenderedExpression.md) :
  Returns list with circe generated documentation
- [`getEnabledCdReports()`](getEnabledCdReports.md) : Get enable cd
  reports from available data
- [`incidenceRatesView()`](incidenceRatesView.md) : incidence Rates View
- [`inclusionRulesView()`](inclusionRulesView.md) : inclusion Rules View
- [`indexEventBreakdownView()`](indexEventBreakdownView.md) : Index
  event breakdown view
- [`orpahanConceptsView()`](orpahanConceptsView.md) : Orphan Concepts
  View
- [`timeDistributionsView()`](timeDistributionsView.md) :
  timeDistributions view
- [`visitContextView()`](visitContextView.md) : Visit context module
  view

## Cohort Diagnostics

Run cohort diagnostics, deploy shiny

- [`cohortCountsModule()`](cohortCountsModule.md) : Shiny module for
  cohort counts
- [`cohortCountsView()`](cohortCountsView.md) : Cohort Counts View
- [`cohortDefinitionsModule()`](cohortDefinitionsModule.md) : Cohort
  Definition module
- [`cohortDefinitionsView()`](cohortDefinitionsView.md) : Cohort
  Definitions View
- [`cohortDiagCharacterizationView()`](cohortDiagCharacterizationView.md)
  : characterization
- [`cohortDiagnosticsHelperFile()`](cohortDiagnosticsHelperFile.md) :
  The location of the description module helper file
- [`cohortDiagnosticsServer()`](cohortDiagnosticsServer.md) : Cohort
  Diagnostics Explorer main module
- [`cohortDiagnosticsView()`](cohortDiagnosticsView.md) : View for
  cohort diagnostics module
- [`cohortOverlapView()`](cohortOverlapView.md) : Cohort Overlap View
- [`compareCohortCharacterizationView()`](compareCohortCharacterizationView.md)
  : compare characterization view
- [`conceptsInDataSourceView()`](conceptsInDataSourceView.md) : concepts
  In DataSource View
- [`createCdDatabaseDataSource()`](createCdDatabaseDataSource.md) :
  Create a CD data source from a database
- [`databaseInformationView()`](databaseInformationView.md) : database
  Information View
- [`getCirceRenderedExpression()`](getCirceRenderedExpression.md) :
  Returns list with circe generated documentation
- [`getEnabledCdReports()`](getEnabledCdReports.md) : Get enable cd
  reports from available data
- [`incidenceRatesView()`](incidenceRatesView.md) : incidence Rates View
- [`inclusionRulesView()`](inclusionRulesView.md) : inclusion Rules View
- [`indexEventBreakdownView()`](indexEventBreakdownView.md) : Index
  event breakdown view
- [`orpahanConceptsView()`](orpahanConceptsView.md) : Orphan Concepts
  View
- [`timeDistributionsView()`](timeDistributionsView.md) :
  timeDistributions view
- [`visitContextView()`](visitContextView.md) : Visit context module
  view

## Report module

Report generating module

- [`reportHelperFile()`](reportHelperFile.md) : The location of the
  report module helper file
- [`reportServer()`](reportServer.md) : The module server for the shiny
  app report module
- [`reportViewer()`](reportViewer.md) : The module viewer for the shiny
  app report module

## PheValuator module

PheValuator module

- [`phevaluatorHelperFile()`](phevaluatorHelperFile.md) : The location
  of the phevaluator module helper file
- [`phevaluatorServer()`](phevaluatorServer.md) : The module server for
  the main phevaluator module
- [`phevaluatorViewer()`](phevaluatorViewer.md) : The viewer of the
  phevaluator module

## Large Table

Utilities for tables that contain large amounts of rows

- [`LargeDataTable`](LargeDataTable.md) : Large Data Table
- [`createLargeSqlQueryDt()`](createLargeSqlQueryDt.md) : Create Large
  Sql Query Data Table
- [`largeTableServer()`](largeTableServer.md) : Large Table Component
  Server
- [`largeTableView()`](largeTableView.md) : Large Table Component Viewer

## Utils

Shared usable utility functions

- [`datasourcesHelperFile()`](datasourcesHelperFile.md) : Define the
  helper file for the module
- [`datasourcesServer()`](datasourcesServer.md) : The server function
  for the datasources module
- [`datasourcesViewer()`](datasourcesViewer.md) : The viewer function
  for hte datasources module
- [`getLogoImage()`](getLogoImage.md) : The location of the OHDSI logo
- [`resultTableServer()`](resultTableServer.md) : Result Table Server
- [`resultTableViewer()`](resultTableViewer.md) : Result Table Viewer

## Example

Connection to example results database

## Home

Home module functions

- [`homeHelperFile()`](homeHelperFile.md) : The location of the home
  module helper file
- [`homeServer()`](homeServer.md) : The module server for exploring
  summary html files
- [`homeViewer()`](homeViewer.md) : The module viewer for exploring
  summary results
